attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: SOUTHSEA SKATEPARK IS ONE OF THE ONLY && ACE SKATEPARKS AROUND!!! ITS BEEN THERE BEFORE WE WHERE ALL BORN!! MY CUZ USED TO TAKE ME & MY TWIN THERE TO WATCH HIM & STILL DOES ITS MEMORIES & IF YOUR GOING TO CLOSE IT DOWN THEN NO ONE WILL EVER LEAVE YOU ALONE GOVERMENT!!!!! YOU TELL US ALL THE TIME TO DO MORE EXERSIZE THIS IS SOMETHING YOU CAN DO THATS CLEARS YOUR HEAD & IS IMMENCE FUN!! YOU GO AHEAD AND TRY BUT DONT THINK FOR ONE MINITE GOVERMENT THAT ITS GOING TO STOP!!!!!!!!!!!!! THANKS NICI EMMS OXNICIXO@HOTMAIL.CO.UK

rejection.details: Can you incorporate Southsea skatepark into the title and remove the email address?
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
